directions: Whisk olive oil, lemon, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper in a large bowl. Add red bell pepper, green bell pepper, cucumbers, tomatoes, radishes, dill pickles, and green onions; toss to combine. Let marinate in the refrigerator until flavors combine, 10 to 15 minutes.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon garlic powder, or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
4 radishes, chopped, or more to taste
3 green onions, sliced, or more to taste
title: Vegan Mediterranean Salad
